item.name: Trap SNMP - {HOST.HOST}
item.description: Item recebe todas as traps que contenham o hostname definido.

trigger.name: Trap: Application {$SERVICE1} runmode changed to Backup - {HOST.HOST}
trigger.description: Switchover Application's runmode changed to Backup Solution Control Server (SCS) generates this log event on behalf of any application when the application starts to run in Backup mode.

trigger.name: Trap: Application {$SERVICE1} runmode changed to Primary- {HOST.HOST}
trigger.description: Switchover Application's runmode changed to Primary Solution Control Server (SCS) generates this log event on behalf of any application when the application starts to run in Primarymode.

trigger.recovery_expression: {Template Genesys Traps:snmptrap["{HOST.HOST}"].str("{$SERVICE1}")}=1 and {Template Genesys Traps:snmptrap["{HOST.HOST}"].str("5060")}=1 or {Template Genesys Traps:snmptrap["{HOST.HOST}"].str("{$SERVICE1}")}=1 and {Template Genesys Traps:snmptrap["{HOST.HOST}"].str("5090")}=1
trigger.name: Trap: Application {$SERVICE1} terminated due to internal condition - {HOST.HOST}
trigger.description: Application {$SERVICE1} terminated due to internal condition
